Members.name: Receive1
Members.summary: Receive a message (or message-part) from a remote socket in blocking mode.
Members.returns: A object containing the data recieved and the operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Receive2
Members.summary: Receive a message (or message-part) from a remote socket in non-blocking mode. If the specified timeout elapses, is set in , indicating that the receive operation should be attempted again.
Members.returns: A object containing the data recieved and the operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Send1
Members.summary: Queue a single-part message (or the final message-part) to be sent by the socket in blocking mode.
Members.param: An array of type that contains the message to be sent.
Members.returns: A value indicating the send operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Send2
Members.summary: Queue a single-part message (or the final message-part) to be sent by the socket in non-blocking mode. If the specified timeout elapses, is returned, indicating that the send operation should be attempted again.
Members.param: An array of type that contains the message to be sent.
Members.returns: A value indicating the send operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: SendPart1
Members.summary: Queue part of a multi-part message to be sent by the socket in blocking mode. More message parts will follow.
Members.param: An array of type that contains the message to be sent.
Members.returns: A value indicating the send operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: SendPart2
Members.summary: Queue part of a multi-part message to be sent by the socket in non-blocking mode. More message parts will follow. If the specified timeout elapses, is returned, indicating that the send operation should be attempted again.
Members.param: An array of type that contains the message to be sent.
Members.returns: A value indicating the send operation outcome.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Subscribe
Members.summary: Sets a new message filter for the current socket.

Members.name: Unsubscribe
Members.summary: Remove an existing filter on the current socket.
Members.param: An existing prefix previously established via Subscribe.

Members.name: UnsubscribeAll
Members.summary: Remove subscription filter for all incoming messages. Other filters may remain.

Members.name: ReceiveReady
Members.summary: Occurs when at least one message may be received from the socket without blocking.

Members.name: SendReady
Members.summary: Occurs when at least one message may be sent via the socket without blocking.

Members.name: Poll1
Members.summary: Multiplex input/output events over the contained set of sockets in blocking mode, firing or as appropriate.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.

Members.name: Poll2
Members.summary: Multiplex input/output events over the contained set of sockets in non-blocking mode, firing or as appropriate. Returns when one or more events are ready to fire or when the specified timeout elapses, whichever comes first.
Members.exception: An error occured during the execution of a native procedure.
